import React from 'react' const Skills = () => { return (

Skills

As an agency verteran I've picked up many skills along the way, from UX testing to animation, but code is where my heart is. If there's a required skill missing below please bear in mind that I am a quick and enthusiastic learner! 🤓

  • UI development:
  • Javascript
  • jQuery
  • React
  • React Hooks
  • CSS
  • SCSS
  • PHP
  • Wordpress
  • D3.js
  • NPM
  • Git
  • Bitbucket
  • Sourcetree
  • Mamp
  • UX:
  • Adobe XD
  • Sketch
  • Balsamiq
  • Figma
  • PHP
  • Digital Marketing Production:
  • After Effects
  • HTML5 banner production
  • Adobe Animate
  • Celtra
  • Google Doubleclick Studio
  • Custom HTML emails
  • Hubspot email templates & website integration
  • Mailchimp and Campaign Monitor template builds
); } export default Skills
